verbs.description: < p > [ARG0: The Trump administration] [V: said] [ARGM-TMP: on Thursday] [ARG1: it would spend $ 4 million on construction projects in the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge in preparation for oil drilling in the nation 's biggest wildlife park.</p] >

< p > The Trump administration said on Thursday it [V: would] spend $ 4 million on construction projects in the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge in preparation for oil drilling in the nation 's biggest wildlife park.</p >

< p > The Trump administration said on Thursday [ARG0: it] [ARGM-MOD: would] [V: spend] [ARG3: $ 4 million] [ARG1: on construction projects in the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge] [ARGM-PRP: in preparation for oil drilling in the nation 's biggest wildlife park.</p] >
